channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattress dumped by bus stop, 3rd December
item.description:
It's been here for two weeks, it needs removing. Foxes are sleeping on it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73,75,77,79,81, Plough Way, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins left permanently on the pavement, 3rd December
item.description:
This has been reported previously but the residents at 48 Rudloe just leave their bins permanently on the pavement. They’re often overflowing as well.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rudloe Road, Clapham, Greater London

item.title: Safety barriers to council work carried out waiting to be cleared, 3rd December
item.description:
Work has been carried out in street. Most rubble removed but a small amount of stone still left with safety barriers. Picture shows barriers fallen down on Friday last week. Further picture shows them stacked this week by ourselves to reduce hazard. There was no lighting for barriers. Please arrange for collection of barriers and broom to sweep remaining small stones the grabber couldn't get. Thankyou

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Irene Road, Crofton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, including manure, left on street, 3rd December
item.description:
Rubbish bags that include a bag of garden waste with manure in have been left on the pavement for weeks and is spilling out. Also, the council sent someone to sweep up the leaves but they left them there in white bags, which the binmen didn't take, and now animals have ripped into them so they're spilling out too.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Orchard Hill, Lewisham
Report on FixMyStreet
